Local businesses near TD Garden saw increased foot traffic due to the concert's popularity.

articles.title: Most of Mass. now in ‘significant’ drought, raising wildfire concerns
articles.description:
The elevated drought levels come after Massachusetts experienced a particularly dry August.

The post Most of Mass. now in ‘significant’ drought, raising wildfire concerns appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts is experiencing significant drought conditions affecting most regions as of September 2023.
August 2023 was particularly dry, contributing to elevated drought levels across the state.
Increased drought raises wildfire risks, prompting concerns for Boston residents and local wildlife.
